metadata.title: CVE-2024-9029 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the freeimage library. Processing a crafted image cancause a buffer over-read of 1 byte in the read_iptc_profile function in theSource/Metadata/IPTC.cpp file because the size of the profile is not beingsanitized, causing a crash in the application linked to the library,resulting in a denial of service.

criterions.comment: freeimage package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
